title: Shiloh National Military Park: Support Your Park
body: Support Your Park       You can help Shiloh National Military Park by becoming a volunteer. Participate in the Volunteers-in-Parks (VIP) program! Learn what opportunities are available for different volunteer activities at Shiloh National Military Park.   You can also support Shiloh National Military Park through your purchases at the Eastern National Bookstores located at Shiloh Battlefield and the Corinth Civil War Interpretive Center.  Donations Your donation helps Shiloh National Military Park provide interpretive and educational programs for future visitors.  If you would like to make a donation, there are donations boxes located in the park Visitor Centers or you may send a personal check, money order, or cashier's check made payable to:  National Park Service Shiloh National Military Park 1055 Pittsburg Landing Road Shiloh, TN 38376
